Query: How do I check the version of Ubuntu I am running?

su_935499: for /f "tokens=3 usebackq" %a in (`reg query "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsoft\Internet Explorer" /v version ^| find "version"`)  do echo IE version: %a
